external_games.name: The Enlightened League of Bone Builders and the Osseous Enigma Content
The Enlightened League of Bone Builders and the Osseous Enigma Content

name: The Enlightened League of Bone Builders and the Osseous Enigma Content
summary: Reckon yourself to be a most esteemed anatomist, do you? Well then immerse yourself in an intriguing Victorian parlour of curios to see how quickly you can piece together Yorick's complete skeleton. There are lots of other things to explore too, so stop your lollygagging and see if you've got the right stuff to join the Enlightened League of Bone Builders. The timer has started!
